thread.title: Wiz Khalifa mourns the death of his sister Doreen 'Lala' Thomaz
thread.title_full: Wiz Khalifa mourns the death of his sister Doreen 'Lala' Thomaz

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Wiz Khalifa mourns the death of his sister Doreen 'Lala' Thomaz
text:
Showbiz Wiz Khalifa mourns the death of his sister Dorien 'Lala' Thomaz The rapper shared the sad news on his Twitter account after his sibling passed away earlier this week Share Wiz Khalifa mourned the passing of his sister Doreen 'Lala' Thomaz Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Wiz Khalifa is mourning the death of his sister Dorien ‘Lala’ Thomaz, who died on Monday aged 32. 
The rapper - whose real name is Cameron Jibril Thomaz - shared the sad news about his sibling, who is transgender, on social media. 
“When you find someone who understands you and sets their personal needs aside to find out yours that’s a beautiful thing,” he wrote in a moving tribute on Twitter. 
“The loss of my sibling has been the hardest thing I’ve had to deal with but with your prayers and well wishes my family will get through this.” Wiz has pledged to 'get through this' with his family (Photo: Getty) The tweet Wiz Khalifa shared with his followers (Photo: WizKhalifa/Twitter) 
Wiz and Dorien’s mother, Peachie Wimbush, shared some emotional words on Instagram from the film Steel Magnolias, and her child’s obituary and a picture of her holding hands with her daughter. 
“...there was no noise, no tremble, just peace. Oh God(dess), I realized as a woman how lucky I am. I was there when that wonderful creature drifted into my life and I was there when she drifted out. It was the most precious moment of my life." ---M'Lynn Steel Magnolias 
"I have seen, heard and felt every bit of your love." 
The obituary read: "Dorien “Lala” Thomaz, age 32, passed away peacefully with her Mother by her side on February 20, 2017. Wiz and his ex-wife Amber Rose (Photo: Splash News) 
"Lala was born on October 31, 1984 to Peachie and Laurence. 
"Dear sibling of Cameron Thomaz and half sister Lauren Thomaz; also survived by grandparents, many aunts, uncles, and cousins." 
The cause of death has not yet been revealed. Video Loading
